ch.epfl.lis.gnw
Class SubnetExtractor

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnw.SubnetExtractor

public class SubnetExtractor
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the module extraction method from a source network.

Author:
Thomas Schaffter (firstname.name@gmail.com), Daniel Marbach (firstname.name@gmail.com)

Constructor Detail

SubnetExtractor

Constructor

Method Detail

extractRegulators

public ch.epfl.lis.imod.ImodNetwork extractRegulators()
Extract a subnetwork consisting of all regulators of the source network, i.e., all nodes that have outdegree one or higher. Note that if a regulator only targets genes that are not regulators themselves, it has outdegree zero in the subnetwork of all regulators, but it has outdegree one or higher in the source network.

runExtraction

public ch.epfl.lis.networks.Structure[] runExtraction(java.lang.String subnetName,
                                                      int subnetSize,
                                                      int numSubnets)
Extract multiple subnetworks from the given source network. For every subnetwork, a different random seed is randomly selected.

Parameters:
subnetName - The name for the subnets ('-i' will be appended for the i'th subnet)
subnetSize - The desired size of the extracted subnetworks
numSubnets - The number of subnetsworks to be generated
Returns:
An array of extracted subnetworks

runExtraction

public ch.epfl.lis.networks.Structure[] runExtraction(java.lang.String subnetName,
                                                      int subnetSize,
                                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node>> seeds)
Extract multiple subnetworks from the given source network. The number of extracted modules is given by the number of provided seeds (seeds.size()).

Parameters:
subnetName - The name for the subnets ('-i' will be appended for the i'th subnet)
seeds - Specifies for every desired subnet the list of seed nodes
subnetSize - The desired size of the extracted subnetworks
Returns:
An array of extracted subnetworks

getNeighbors

public java.util.ArrayList<ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node> getNeighbors(java.util.ArrayList<ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node> subnet)
Get the neighboring nodes of the given subnet (the set of nodes connected by one link to the subnet, but not part of the subnet). If numRegulators > 0, only regulators are returned if the subnet size is still smaller than numRegulators, and only non-regulators are returned once the subnet size is greater or equal numRegulators.
